Spawn() Spawngame.logic.tilespawner.TPiece game.logic.tilespawner.TPieceSpawn
ITileable game.logic.tilespawner.TPiece.Spawn ( )[inline]
Creates and spawns a new tile with a specified color.
Returns
A new instance of ITileable representing the spawned tile.
This method instantiates a new tile object with the color magenta. The spawned tile can be used in various game or application contexts where a tileable element is required. The method ensures that each call results in a fresh instance of a tile, allowing for dynamic creation and management of tileable elements in the environment.
Implements game.logic.tilespawner.ISpawnable.
